## Small Slice of Data

Start off by grabbing small chunks of the data

```{r setup}
library(RSocrata)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r data}
## credential types based on credential code
credential_types <- 
  RSocrata::read.socrata("https://data.ct.gov/resource/rykc-pttg.json")

## 
licenced_facilities <- 
  RSocrata::read.socrata("https://data.ct.gov/resource/ngch-56tr.json?$limit=100")

```

### Taking a Peek

```{r}
dplyr::glimpse(credential_types)
dplyr::glimpse(licenced_facilities)

```

Let's try and grab license data that is from 2024 onward.

```{r}
###| eval: false
###| include: false
newish_licensed_facilities <- 
   RSocrata::read.socrata("https://data.ct.gov/resource/ngch-56tr.json?$where=expirationdate >= '2025-01-28'")
```

holy cow this is taking forever.
